title: After the Cannon Fodder’s Rebirth - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Mature   Romance   Tragedy   Yaoi
tags: Absent Parents   Abusive Characters   Acting   Amnesia   Ancient China   Artificial Intelligence   Beastkin   Child Abuse   Cold Love Interests   Cunning Protagonist   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Depression   Devoted Love Interests   Enemies Become Lovers   Hated Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lovers Reunited   Masochistic Characters   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Obsessive Love   Orphans   Returning from Another World   Revenge   Ruthless Protagonist   Shameless Protagonist   Siblings Not Related by Blood   System Administrator   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Unrequited Love   Weak to Strong   World Hopping   Yandere
author: Rain Falls Like Dust   Yu Luo Qing Chen   雨落轻尘
description:
“White Moonlight (Bai Yueguang) lies within a certain part of the heart, you are my unspeakable wound.”

Having the natural constitution of being a White Moonlight, He Ziming, after his death, got bound to the “Cannon fodder’s Counterattack System,” and thus began his journey of being reborn as all kinds of cannon fodder, helping the original owners of the body he is occupying fulfilling their wishes, face-slapping the protagonists and becoming their White Moonlight.

Because I like you, I die, but to you I am as insignificant as a bird’s feather.

However, I still want you to remember me for your whole life, to engrave my name into your heart and soul so deeply that your heart will hurt by only thinking of me.>
